creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: black cotton shoe body with blue side linings; upturned toe; satin stitch embroidery on front and sides in floral design in pinks, yellow, green, orange, red; reinforced sole (plant fiber and fabric) with heavy cord stitching throughout
title: Pair of Shoes
